donate.title: Donate
donate.description:
Thank you for supporting L2BEAT's mission to bring education and transparency to the blockchain space.

We're committed to delivering accurate and reliable information. We strive to be an impartial and independent watchdog that acts in the best interest of users and the broader ecosystem while always remaining credibly neutral and faithful to reality and facts. We deliver data and tools that allow our community to educate themselves, transact securely, and make well-informed decisions.

Your support means a lot to our small, independent team. Thank you!

fundingSources.title: Funding sources
fundingSources.description: As a public goods company, L2BEAT is financed in the open by the community. For transparency, we are providing L2BEAT's funding sources below.

classification.description: Those funding sources have been categorized based on the contribution amounts:
classification.tiers:
• Significant: Above {significantValue, number, USD}
  • Medium: Between {smallValue, number, USD} and {significantValue, number, USD}
  • Small: Below {smallValue, number, USD}

rewardsAndCompensation.title: Rewards & compensation for participating in L2 governance frameworks
rewardsAndCompensation.description: We are participating in the governance of Arbitrum, Optimism, Hop, Polygon, Uniswap and Connext, and more

starkexExplorer.title: Open-source explorer for StarkEx deployments
starkexExplorer.description: Live at dydx.l2beat.com, view the code here. Funded by StarkWare and dYdX

layerZeroDashboard.title: LayerZero transparency dashboard
layerZeroDashboard.description: Project in progress. Funded by LayerZero
